lore: Borne upon his throne by a scrabbling mound of Nurglings, Epidemius endlessly catalogues the infinite plagues and maladies released upon realspace by the followers of Nurgle. The higher Epidemiusâ€™ tally rises upon any given battlefield, the more favourably the Plague God smiles upon his servants in the vicinity.

otherAbilities.name: Blessed by the Plague God:
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save .

otherAbilities.name: Tally of Pestilence:
otherAbilities.description: Keep a tally of how many enemy models are destroyed by NURGLE LEGIONES DAEMONICA LEGIONES DAEMONICA models from your army during the battle. At the start of your Command phase , if this tally is 7 or more, you gain 1CP and the tally is reset to 0.
